## DEFAULT\_DEBOUNCE\_MS variable

Default debounce time in ms.

If multiple filesystem events are occured during this time only one callback will be called with the final value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DEFAULT_DEBOUNCE_MS = 50
```
